You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &ccirc;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ccirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0108/index.htm U+00108].
  * `&ccirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0109/index.htm U+00109].
